tool_description: An API for detailed information regarding the healthcare providers present in a country.
name: Care Locations
title: Care Locations

api_list.name: Insurances
api_list.description: Retrieve all insurances and their policies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://care-locations.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/insurances"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "care-locations.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: SearchTypes
api_list.description: Retrieve the all searchable types. This may be practice types or specific treatments.
api_list.code:

api_list.name: InsuranceById
api_list.description: Retrieves an insurance and its policies by its Id

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for care providers within a certain radius around a place

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The locationId, retrieved from the autocomplete endpoint

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: The radius (in km) to search within

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type that should be filtered for, retrieved from as the Id from the types endpoint

optional_parameters.name: insurancePolicyId
optional_parameters.description: If provided, filter results by insurance policies supported by the practice

api_list.name: Autocomplete
api_list.description: Find the corresponding locationId for a given city, postcode or parts of it

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Partial location value to execute the autocomplete for
